summary:
Canon Lore Follower Trainer Merchant
Zip 125KB, Fps >1, Warmaidens Staff,
Well crafted Cleaned, Tested & Proven.
Useful addition for your next Playthru!
Original Author- JWMcQuire
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b] Marinda Avenicci

[/b][/size]Marinda is an Imperial Armorer and master trainer in smithing. As her last name indicates, she is Adrianne's sister and the daughter of Proventus.
She's a little quieter but no less full of herself than her sister, and the equal in Metallurgy, Particularly with Rare & Exotic materials... She can be
found in and around Warmaidens most days and will do Training in the afternoons... so show up -- suitably attired AND with your own kit!


New and Experienced players both, will find Marinda a convenient addition to the platform for a full playthru.





All file assets are Vanilla...
Screenshots Use...
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72586/?]Skin Textures Pride of Valhalla
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73137/?]Hair KS Wigs
[/url]
author: Hilljon
